name: Necromancer's Garden
description:
So there's good news, bad news, more good news, and more bad news.

Good news: You finally found the perfect plot of land for a garden.

Bad news: It's a cemetery.

Good news: You managed to get a job as a grave digger.

Bad news: People in town are dying way more frequently than you expected. 

What's a budding necromancer with a green thumb to do? Well, make lemonade out of lemons, of course! Or, more aptly, pumpkins out of cadavers. Exploit magical and botanical synergies as you manage your graveyard garden to complete a dark ritual while avoiding being overrun by the dearly departed!
